short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated branch naming for Azure DevOps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Azure DevOps has no solution to auto fill branch names, when creating a branch from a ticket. This extension lets you configure a set of rules, which autofills the branch name with the given information.
